title: Led Zeppelin - 1980.07.03 Mannheim, Germany (Matrix)
description:
Led Zeppelin - 1980.07.03 Mannheim, Germany (Matrix)   

Led Zeppelin
Eisstadion, Mannheim, Germany, July 3, 1980
Title: Mannheim Steamroller
Matrix (Blending of Soundboard and Audience sources into 
one audio stream)
Matrix executed using Pro Tools on G4 Mac
A Bluecongo Matrix Production

Soundboard Source: 
Incomplete excellent soundboard recording. The recording 
is a very good balanced professional board tape

Audience Source: 
Incomplete very good audience recording. The tape 
is somewhat distant but clear. 

Tracklist:

01. Intro (1:35)
02. Train Kept a Rollin' (2:55)
03. Nobody's Fault but Mine (6:12)
04. Black Dog (6:40)
05. In the Evening (10:20)
06. The Rain Song (8:06)
07. Hot Dog (3:48)
08. All my Love (6:30)
09. Trampled Under Foot (9:03)
10. Since I've been Loving You (9:30)
11. Achilles Last Stand (10:47)
12. White Summer/Black Mountain Side (8:16)
13. Kashmir (10:55)
14. Stairway to Heaven (17:13)
15. Communication Breakdown (3:02)
16. Rock and Roll (3:49)

Comments: A better show than the night before, although 
still sluggish in some places. The opening numbers are 
good, including an extended The Train Kept A Rollin'. 
Overall, the show is very good although as a whole not 
quite as good as previous ones on the tour. Still, they 
are in high sprits and play very well, including a great 
middle string of numbers. The only weak link is Stairway 
To Heaven, with Robert giving it a deliberate lounge act 
reading, showing the band's apathy for it
